fields.description:
Description:
While testing kitchen sink, Phone>Camera> Video record, the video is recorded, but never saves, and the app sits with the activity indicator.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install and launch KS
2) navigate to Phone>Camera> Video record
3) Record a video
4) Stop recording

Result:
The activity indicator is shown, but the app doesn't seem to save.

Expected result:
The video is saved and the video is then played back

Notes:
Does not occur on 1.6.2
fields.summary: iOS: KitchenSink video recorded, but app does not save the file, activity indicator spinning indefinitely
fields.environment: iPhone4 Verizon (4.2.6), Titanium SDK version:(1.7.0.e6afca8...), Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.0.201105111905

comments.body: Verified fixed. (1_7_X, e6afca8..., iPad Simulator and 1GT device.)
Wrong close comment, reopening to change it.
